name: Hiking at Lands End
description: Scenic coastal trail with breathtaking views of the Golden Gate Bridge.

name: Movie Night at AMC Metreon
description: Watch the latest blockbuster in a state-of-the-art theater.

name: Board Game Cafe
description: Enjoy a variety of board games while sipping on coffee and snacks.

name: Escape Room Challenge
description: Solve puzzles and escape from themed rooms within 60 minutes.

name: Cooking Class at Sur La Table
description: Learn to cook gourmet dishes with professional chefs.

name: Golden Gate Park Picnic
description: Enjoy a picnic in the beautiful Golden Gate Park with team-provided food.

name: Bowling at Presidio Bowl
description: Classic bowling fun with shoe rental included.

name: Wine Tasting Tour
description: Visit local wineries and learn about wine tasting.

name: Indoor Rock Climbing
description: Challenge yourself with indoor rock climbing walls.

name: Comedy Night
description: Enjoy a night of laughter at a local comedy club.
